# This folder contains code documentation that can be used to run analyses outlined in the selected paper.
## Code documentation should be run in the order as follows:
  1. Data_Inspection - inspects raw data raws used for analysis
  2. plink.sh - bash file for PLINK operation
  3. snpStats - reading .ped files into R
  4. Allele_Frequncies - generation of allele frequency figures
  5. PCA - identification of hybrids (DAPC) and PCA analysis
  6. Map - generation of map with individuals assigned to each population
  7. SNP_Positions - generation of introgressed SNP position figures
